I am an undergraduate student pursuing dual degrees in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence at the [School of Applied Mathematics](https://emap.fgv.br/en) (FGV EMAp) and Social Sciences at the [Superior School of Social Sciences](https://cpdoc.fgv.br/en) (FGV CPDOC). - Computational Social Sciences, Political Science, and Public Policy
- AI Safety and Governance
